comments:
Build 20020418

I got the following NPE exiting my workbench (sorry no steps to reproduce):

This is because of an optimization we released in Thursday's build.  We 
discovered yesterday that the optimization was not safe, because of precisely 
this scenario.  The steps to reproduce are something like:

begin operation
- invoke a builder that does no work
end operation

We then discard that tree because we discovered that it was a "no-op".  Then 
when we go to save, it can't find the tree associated with that builder's last 
built state.

We are planning to back out of the changes that caused this.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14179 ***
